snippet: Already a star at the Islands of Adventure park, a Potter-themed area will be being added to the adjacent Universal Studios Florida in 2014.
abstract: Universal Studios announces that theme park area based on J K Rowling's bestselling book and movie series Harry Potter will open at Universal Studios Florida in 2014; Potter-themed area is already popular at Universal's adjacent theme park Islands of Adventure.
lead_paragraph: Already a star at the Islands of Adventure park, a Potter-themed area will be being added to the adjacent Universal Studios Florida in 2014.

headline.main: A Double Dose of Harry Potter Planned for Universal Theme Parks
headline.print_headline: Universal Theme Park Adding Some Potter
